{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Insect Plate |image = [[File:Insect_Plate_Updated.png|150px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Insect Plate''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 100 {{Gem|Bug}} }} ==Description== The '''Insect Plate''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Insect Plate has a value of 100 [[Gems|Bug Gems]] {{Gem|Bug}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Acquisition== Insect Plates can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Ilex Forest|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Petalburg Woods|Epic}} {{LootItem|Eterna Forest|Epic}} {{LootItem|Hall of Origin|Epic}} {{LootItem|Relic Castle|Epic}} {{LootItem|Seaside Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|P2 Laboratory|Epic}} {{LootItem|Santalune Forest|Epic}} {{LootItem|Frost Cavern|Epic}} {{LootItem|Po Town|Epic}} {{LootItem|Ruins of Abundance|Epic}} |} |} {{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Gems]]
